DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion `` T 6.00 D spherical myopia , `` T 3.00 D refractive astigmatism , stable refraction ( less 0.50D per year sphere cylinder ) , corneal diameter le 11.0 mm allow suction fixation ring , soft contact wearer discontinuation wear least 7 day prior preoperative evaluation , visual acuity correctable least 20/20 eye , 21 year age , ability participate followup examination 12 month LASIK surgery .
